name: Walk me baby, one more time
name_original: Walk me baby, one more time
description:
Have you ever walked a dog?
If so, you've probably noticed how it's a tradeoff between your and your dog's needs.
It has its own mind and will certainly try pull you in the direction it wants to go, if you're not headed the same way.

So, go on a walk with our virtual dog and try to keep it safe and relaxed.

Watch out for cars, cats and other dogs though!

The stress meter shows your and your dog's stress level combined - should it be completely filled, the game ends.
If the dog is constantly pulling on the leash, your and their stress will go up.
Have a rest ad benches or collect drink-powerups to decrease your own stress.
Let the dog sniff where it wants or collect bone-powerups to decrease its stress.
